com.mapbox.services.android.telemetry.location

Class GoogleLocationEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.services.android.telemetry.location.LocationEngine
      • com.mapbox.services.android.telemetry.location.GoogleLocationEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient.ConnectionCallbacks, com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient.OnConnectionFailedListener, com.google.android.gms.location.LocationListener

    public class GoogleLocationEngine
extends LocationEngine
implements com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient.ConnectionCallbacks, com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient.OnConnectionFailedListener, com.google.android.gms.location.LocationListener
    Sample LocationEngine using Google Play Services

    • Method Detail

      • getLocationEngine

        public static LocationEngine getLocationEngine(Context context)

      • activate

        public void activate()
        Description copied from class: LocationEngine
        Activate the location engine which will connect whichever location provider you are using. You'll need to call this before requesting user location updates using LocationEngine.requestLocationUpdates().
        Specified by:
        activate in class LocationEngine

      • deactivate

        public void deactivate()
        Description copied from class: LocationEngine
        Disconnect the location engine, useful when you no longer need location updates or requesting the users LocationEngine.getLastLocation(). Before deactivating you'll need to stop request user location updates using LocationEngine.removeLocationUpdates().
        Specified by:
        deactivate in class LocationEngine

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
        Description copied from class: LocationEngine
        Check if your location provider has been activated/connected. This is mainly used internally but is also useful in the rare cases when you'd like to know if your location engine is connected or not.
        Specified by:
        isConnected in class LocationEngine
        Returns:
        boolean true if the location engine has been activated/connected, else false.

      • onConnected

        public void onConnected(@Nullable
                        Bundle bundle)
        Specified by:

        public void onConnectionSuspended(int cause)
        Specified by:

      • onConnectionFailed

        public void onConnectionFailed(@NonNull
                               com.google.android.gms.common.ConnectionResult connectionResult)
        Specified by:
        onConnectionFailed in interface com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient.OnConnectionFailedListener

      • getLastLocation

        public Location getLastLocation()
        Description copied from class: LocationEngine
        When first initializing the location engine the location updates oftentimes aren't immediate and your user experience might diminish since they are forced to wait till a more accurate update arrives. A solution to this is to request the last known user location. There are no guarantees this won't return null since the Location object is simply stored in cache.
        Specified by:
        getLastLocation in class LocationEngine
        Returns:
        The last known user location as a Location object.

      • requestLocationUpdates

        public void requestLocationUpdates()
        Description copied from class: LocationEngine
        if a LocationEngineListener is setup, registering for location updates will tell the provider to begin sending updates.
        Specified by:
        requestLocationUpdates in class LocationEngine

      • removeLocationUpdates

        public void removeLocationUpdates()
        Description copied from class: LocationEngine
        When you no longer wish to receive location updates, you should call this method to prevent the devices battery from draining. It's important to note that your location listeners will remain intake until you call LocationEngine.removeLocationEngineListener(LocationEngineListener).
        Specified by:
        removeLocationUpdates in class LocationEngine

      • obtainType

        public LocationEngine.Type obtainType()
        Specified by:
        obtainType in class LocationEngine

      • onLocationChanged

        public void onLocationChanged(Location location)
        Specified by:
        onLocationChanged in interface com.google.android.gms.location.LocationListener
